name: A Hero's Adventure
description: A game made with RPG Maker MZ for a school project. This game centers on the core idea to raise awareness for mental illness and let others know that these illnesses are completely normal and that help does exist for these. It also wants to raise awareness for help. While this game is not necessarily based off of the creators own mental fights, it is based off of other moments that the creator has experienced from stories heard and assisting others.
